message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. I think it's worth a lot to you, but I'm willing to start with a reasonable price of $150. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Can you meet me halfway?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm not comfortable going that low. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'll counter with a price of $130. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $120?
I understand your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll counter with a price of $125. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Can you try to meet me at $115?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll counter with a price of $118. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my own limits, but I'm still willing to negotiate. Can you meet me at $110?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll counter with a price of $112. This is as low as I can go. What do you think?
I'm really close to my budget, but I'm still willing to try to make a deal. Can you meet me at $105?
